nodes.text: Galaxy at War Miniatures Preview 5: Clone Trooper with Repeating Blaster and Elite Senate Guard

Galaxy at War Miniatures Preview 5: Clone Trooper with Repeating Blaster and Elite Senate Guard is a web supplement by Wizards of the Coast. It previews figures from the Star Wars Miniatures: Galaxy at War set from the Star Wars Miniatures line, as well as containing supplementary information for the Star Wars Saga Edition Roleplaying Game which coincides with the release of the Galaxy at War campaign guide. The supplement was written by Jack Irons. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website and is the fifth of six in the series of "Galaxy at War" web enhancements. This article covers the "Clone Trooper with Repeating Blaster" and the Elite Senate Guard. The "repeating blaster" that the Clone Trooper is equipped with is actually a rotary blaster cannon. This article also includes statistics for a new weapon called a stun bayonet.
